Author: elitecstrike
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Aworker Protocol (AWP): How Will Data Exchange Work? https://medium.com/@aworker/aworker-protocol-awp-how-will-data-exchange-work-d0f5cc42cd74  A company will be able to test candidates through an application connected to the Aworker protocol. The company opens a site or application connected to the Aworker protocol and checks all information stored in distributed ledgers.  Aworker protocol will give complete information to companies when hiring employees. Lack of verified information about applicants is one of the significant problems in HR in our time. It is nearly impossible for one application with centralized servers to solve this problem.  The protocol will unite the efforts of application developers and gather complete information about applicants.  From another side, people can prove their competence without lengthy checks and information gathering. In this case, applicants will be able to manage their data and monetize it if necessary.

Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: platform for recruiting a new generation in the crypto-currency world is something new and interesting! I am sure that many problems affecting the effectiveness of this area will be successfully resolved with the help of blockchain and smart contracts.

Author: Klacik
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: but there really are many problems, in my opinion. these are problems concerning both companies looking for qualified employees and job seekers who want to find a dream job and at the same time realize themselves in the professional sphere.

Author: pavondunbar
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: I see. But then the question arises: Is there really such a problem in the market that workers and employers can not find each other? Or what is the main problem?

Author: amanai
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: I would like to note that the platform implementation technology plays a key role here. blockchain plays the role of P2P recruitment platform, and with the help of smart contracts, you can change the rules for hiring employees in such a way that candidates are recommended to other people, and all participants in key stages will have the opportunity to receive guaranteed rewards.

Author: a1471989
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: also it is a reputation system that will prove the professionalism of the employee. at the same time, the employee will always be able to confirm his skills with the relevant document, and will also be able to receive remuneration.

Author: Klacik
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Yes, there are problems and they are very significant, and the problems arise from both sides. For example, problems for the company in hiring employees are: a) Too many candidates and a problem in their testing. b) High cost of hiring and training c) The complexity of assessing a candidate's abilities due to time constraints.

Author: Klacik
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: I would also like to note the role of the internal token platform, which is tied to hiring employees in the company. Given that the number of tokens is limited, the company will have to spend tokens to hire an employee. this will greatly reduce the process of classical and conventional centralized hiring, when large expenditures go to find a good specialist.

Author: amanai
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: this is due to the decentralization, which gives an excellent opportunity to create a unique product and an ecosystem of a new generation in which each person can show his professionalism and create a reputation as a reliable employee in just a couple of clicks.

Author: amanai
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: It's just wonderful! Well, thank you very much for your advice! Do you happen to know if I can earn free tokens? Maybe there is a Bounty program?

Author: a1471989
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: with regard to blockchain and smart contracts, they also help in the following processes: HR managers with the help of smart contracts will be able to create a vacancy and play key information about the candidate in the blockchain, because it gives more reliable information about applicants.

Author: pavondunbar
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: And what is the problem for the employee to make a good resume and independently look for a job? I thought that this is not a big problem in the modern world?

Author: Klacik
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: this unique product will help, mainly, to reduce costs for companies in the search for an employee, because hiring a new person is an expensive process - in the US this is $ 8000. besides, it is not always possible to assess the real professionalism of the candidate, since the information in the resume may be different from what he can say at the interview. all this takes time, and this platform will help in reducing this time, which also affects financially the productivity, because idle times in production also cost a lot of money.

Author: BTCFaucets
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: If I'm not mistaken, then the Bounty campaign is already completed. But you can learn more in the official Telegram chat https://t.me/aworkerio By the way, I can say that Arworker has one of the best support services for participants, thank you!

Author: a1471989
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: also note that the applicant himself can not always find the desired job even being a high-level specialist, because because of the large number of resumes coming to the company, it is his resume that can simply be lost among thousands of letters. it is not very convenient and as a result the applicant can be in search of work for several months.

Author: amanai
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: I would also like to add that the project contributes not only to reducing unemployment, but also to creating a strong team in business, which is the key to success. every leader knows this, so the problem in finding the team itself will be solved as quickly as possible.

Author: Klacik
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: As you can see the problems are also present! Even good specialists often find it difficult to find a job because of great competition. This is the benefit of Aworker, based on the P2P recruitment platform, job candidates will be recommended by other people, with all participants in the key stages recruiting will receive a reward.

Author: phamhuyenmy2504
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: About Aworker Aworker is a next-generation recruitment platform powered by Blockchain. Aworker will reduce the cost per hire up to 4 times. The hiring of personnel is one of the most influential markets in the world, the volume of which is $429 billion.  There are tens of thousands of hiring agencies in the world The average commission of talent agency may get to 15% of the employee's annual salary. The average 'cost per hire' in the US is $8,000 The hiring process is not transparent nor clear. Aworker develops a disruptive solution by putting blockchain-driven technologies at the core of the Work 2.0. Now each person will receive a reward for his job-related recommendation.  Rewards are paid automatically with the help of a smart contract to all participants in the hiring process.  Aworker is created in order to solve problems:  Reducing the cost of hiring. Middlemen take a high commission for their work. The average cost of closing a middle manager vacancy is $8,000. Smart contracts make this process more transparent and can reduce expenses up to 4 times. Control of personal data. Now people will be able to control personal information and get rewarded for that at the same time. People will find a job that suits them more psychologically. Aworker will help companies to find better employees.  SOURCE: https://icobench.com/ico/aworker

Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment

Author: Klacik
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment

Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment

Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: No, problem. So, as I’ve already said, employees will be paid for sharing information about them. They can hide some info, (for example, contact details) and employers will pay to get it. Also, you can earn some tokens if you become an aworker.

Author: pavondunbar
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Great idea. Many employees will be very interested in this feature. What exactly does aworker? Is it some kind of headhunter? Can you tell me more details about it?

Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Actually, it is a most qualified users of the platform. It means that aworker will be like an expert. He/she will verify all information that employee will fill in their CVs. Aworker will recommend employees to employers and it will depend on his/her reputation.

Author: pavondunbar
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment

Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment

Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment

Author: bitokman
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment

Author: BTCFaucets
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment

Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Well, what are the key features this platform will be able to present against the classic methods of finding employees? What is innovative in this?

Author: BTCFaucets
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: A decentralized network allows you to store information in all key skills of an employee. On the experience of work. It also includes a rating system that allows you to assess the level of experience of an employee.

Author: bitokman
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Sounds interesting. Well, what about the various diplomas, certificates and refresher courses? Can the platform store all this information?

Author: BTCFaucets
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Of course, yes, all this information will be stored on the network in a digitized and scrambled form, and no one from outside will have access to editing this information, as I understand it.

Author: JayLovesCrypto
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Dont use it, simply dont understand how "static" models like this will even exist when the blockchain tech really hits.. If they are having to resort to plastering adverts everywhere in order to access a site that should essentially be like a facebook for work, is terrible... Token useage really means that any non blockchain based recruitment will be limited to the usual model, which basically rewards people for moving jobs constantly, and not progressing within your current role... Aworker DOES reward you for this... you grow your profile, your reputation, you become an AWORKER... head and shoulders above the terrible model offered by linkedin.

Author: Crypt0Rhodes
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: I have worked as part of HR and management team in recruiting new staff, and I have used most of the current available services in UK, Reed, Indeed, even Gumtree, etc. They charge quite a lot for their employer subscriptions/ads and sometimes these sites are manipulated by the Whales that smaller businesses have to compete with (ie. they have a bigger budget to pay for their adverts to remain the most visible in searches), I remember searching for our ad one time and couldn't find it within the first few pages - so I know how frustrating and unfair the current marketplace can be. The kind of service being offered on this platform is refreshing for someone like me to hear about!

Author: JayLovesCrypto
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: ABSOLUTELY spot on when it comes to "fluid" jobs.. there are tones of studies being done lately that shows that people now can work up to 40 jobs in their lives, this is a huge shift.. look at the gig economy, it makes up for a lot of the US workforce (most it ever has) and look at the UK zero hour contract situation, millions of people constantly in a battle trying to find whatever hours they can... this is where it'll be a winner.

Author: MisterBean80
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: So in theory, this project will have a better way to verify skills for a job. Will it also allow a person looking for a job to be spotlighted to recruiters? In other-words, what if I possess a skill that is in high demand, but don't want to sift through all the jobs in my field that may be the same old song and dance. Can your project help me only see the most attractive options and ignore the rest? I would like to even see where I as the candidate have the option to know my possible salary in advance and create a competitive atmosphere for my skills. Will this project do that?

Author: MisterBean80
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Holy crap I feel your pain!!!! I have had so many unqualified candidates apply simply because they can click a mouse button. I actually was told by my "unnamed" recruiting company that "most of those are just people looking to fulfill unemployment requirements". So you mean to tell me, I pay per click and you blame my quality of candidates on unemployment scam artists??? Wow...I could have come through the phone I was so upset. But what other option do I have? I hope this project solves that issue.

Author: MisterBean80
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: What skills do you think they should avoid? Also, don't you think this would dampen the market for unskilled laborers? Nothing against say...McDonalds, but if they want to use this service to hire, maybe they don't create a job for a rocket scientist, but wouldn't they need to search for skills...thus the need to reward those people who do fit that skillset?

Author: finist4x
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Aworker is the platform that helps to find the most suitable company and job position based on your psycho-type, professional skills, and work achievements. Basically you can be a a) Job seeker, b) Aworker (a person with performance and referral rate), c) Company. As a job seeker you are asked to provide as much information, as you could, this allows you to start proving your profile and also benefit from creating your transparent ID. This is not actually a CV. Then you can find a job post that is checked by the system and structured with exact and necessary figures, such as required skills, rating and so on. You can also make a referral for the opening you like and for some reason have a match for it. You will be rewarded with WORK tokens so far during the referral stages. For more information please check our official group on Telegram and landing page.

Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: In the first year we focus on companies from the USA. Workers can register from any country and find a remote job in US companies. Since 2019, we plan to go to England, Germany, Korea and China. Again, employees will be able to find from anywhere in the world. With 2020 we leave in other countries of Western Europe, Brazil, Argentina, Australia.

Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: "Ecosystem" as "ICO" are not good words now. We know In other side, if it helps to people why we can't so? Our ecosystem based on reputation of employees. Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Glad to hear you! Thank you so much

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: In early stages it's necessary 20 minimum amount of votes. After this number increase to 100 people. And yes, we understand problems with low base. That's why at first steps we are creating Job Marketplace where everyone become recruiter and get reward to his/her referrals. Users will be able to recommend their friend on open jobs and get reward in any cases. It helps to increase amount of users and develop next modules in platform step by step.

Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Thanks so much! Stay tuned
