Author: JonathanHiggins
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Why an assessment of candidate's skills and experience isn't enough?

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: We're seeking to learn as much as we can about the candidate. And we have a good reason for that. Mismatches can be quite costly in terms of absenteeism, low productivity, and turnover. Our major goal is to improve the chance of making a good fit between candidates and the company.

Author: BountifulMan
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: What statistics do you use?

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: For example, according to CareerBuilder, 57% of employers admit that they might not interview a candidate if they can’t find them online.

Author: a007mr
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: How long is the way from interview to offer?

Author: FidelioCplus
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: What can you do about reputation building in cases of professional retraining or some additional training for a new profession?

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: According to the Jobvite 2017 Recruiting Funnel Benchmark Report, the average conversion rate from interview to offer was 19.78% in 2016 (5 interviews per 1 offer).

Author: GreenRivers
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: What differentiates this from LinkedIn?

Author: Marseiliais
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Will employees have to take any employment tests?

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Mostly in cases when they lack some certificates or other documents confirming their skills and competencies.

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: We are not a copy of Linkedin. We are making a product that will make it possible for every sales professional to prove their skills on a global scale. Our product is an independent rating of such linear staff jobs as sales consultants, sales managers, marketing specialists, etc. We do have a better solution than Linkedin can have because we are really specific about our target customers.

Author: Marseiliais
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Should your customers start thinking like you, like HRs, to successfully participate in Aworker project?

Author: cjohn8
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: What will you do with untrustworthy employers who are taking different illegal measures to benefit themselves?

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: On the contrary, we are doing a profound research now in order to have our customers' requirements and expectations as a starting point.

Author: cjohn8
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: That's a great idea, guys! I like your attitude very much, yeah, your vision of the whole process!

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Thank you! We really appreciate your positive approach.

Author: FidelioCplus
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: So what's about professional retraining? Will it be free of charge for your customers?

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Thank you for a good question! We will study it in the nearest future. In any case, evaluation of qualifications, in terms of proving various competencies of each job candidate will be necessary after retraining also.

Author: FidelioCplus
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Yes, it’s very crucial. And it takes quite an effort to get proof of competency, to understand that the particular candidate is really needed and has enough qualification for the particular job vacancy. It is one of the main pain points that every HR or business owner has.

Author: BountifulMan
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: And it's one of the best ways to improve personal growth within the organization. Just to start with the necessity to prove the competencies required.

Author: Sovper11
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: I see you are working on additional motivation issues

Author: BountifulMan
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: It's usual that employees lose motivation with time. Their work becomes a routine and financial motivation doesn't work with experienced employees anymore. They start missing something else...

Author: Marenat
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: when will the ico end?

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Most likely in April, 2018.

Author: cjohn8
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: How will you resolve the privacy issue?

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Privacy issue? Whose privacy issue?

Author: cjohn8
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: What if the employee will not require for his/her info to be displayed in the blockchain?

Author: Sovper11
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Why do you want to use the employee's social networks for evaluation?

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: His or her info will be displayed for professional purpose only at his or her will within the required limits of the skills and competencies described by him or her deliberately.

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: The person’s behavior on social networks, forums or personal blogs can give lots of information about his/her personality, real interests, and overall world outlook.

Author: Sovper11
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Many employers collect a substantial amount of personal information about their employees. Are you going to collect even more information from the social networks?

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: We will collect only the specific information about their personal development from their social networks. We will judge about the employee's ability for self-improvement and further personal growth by his/her posts about the specialized trainings and the professional events he/she attends.

Author: JonathanHiggins
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Why can't you just interview a candidate? What's the problem with that?

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Because we can't just hire a person without checking for the necessary personality traits we're looking for to fill some specific position.

Author: JonathanHiggins
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Do you mean hiring for some hard-to-fill positions?

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Not only for hard-to-fill positions. The matter is that a good job candidate should fit the organization's values, not just fit the job.

Author: JonathanHiggins
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Jobs are like relationships?

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: The applicant can be a good person who is good for the job but not good for the organization because of his/her mismatching values.

Author: JonathanHiggins
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: As a job candidate I can fit the job requirements but not the company values?

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Exactly. That's what need the employee's social networks for. For assessment of the candidate's personality and values.

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: We are working on this now. Still our concept is not that much about using the specific methods, but it is more about building a relationship between people.

Author: Marenat
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Do you mean some sort of tracking relationships between workers and companies?

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: You can join our Bounty here

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: You can join our Bounty here

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Yes, it is the way to build a working ecosystem.

Author: a007mr
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: According to what scale are workers given grades?

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: The results of their work activities are evaluated according to 10 point grading scale.

Author: a007mr
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Can you give a real life example with some sales employee?

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Mike is a sales assistant in a company which sells clothes via its own network of a retail chain. Sometimes he has slowdowns in sales, but he likes the job and shows good result. He wants to earn more, but this year he has not been promoted. He is thinking of changing the company, but he is not sure and afraid of a new team and new professional duties. He is also not sure to be taken to a new company due to tough competition.

Author: a007mr
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: And what is Mike given grades for?

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Mike learns from his colleagues about Aworker application and registers in it.  At the end of the month Mike receives evaluation from his supervisor regarding the results of his work activity according to 10 point grading scale. His supervisor gives him 7 points for his communicative skills, 8 points for his attitude to work and 6 points for his being helpful to colleagues. Meanwhile, Mike has no verified skills at all.

Author: a007mr
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: And what happens next?

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Basing on this data, the total coefficient is calculated and due to it Mike is listed in Sales Consultants Rating. He is ranked 27th in Moscow and 58th in Russia. This month he does not get listed in the top–20 rating of sales assistants of the country (A–List). Still, now he has got a confirmed information about his competency at the international market.

Author: a007mr
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: What about the next month?

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Next month Mike gets his grades again. This time he gets 9 points for his communicative skills, 10 points for his attitude to work, and 10 points for his being helpful to his colleagues. Mike has confirmed 2 professional skills during the month. Basing on this data he gets the 3rd position in Moscow and the 10th position in Russia among the sales consultants. Now Mike gets his rewards in AWE tokens (being equal to 5300 rubles) which he can exchange for rubles or keep them at Aworker. He is also becomes one of the best sales consultants of the country this month.

Author: a007mr
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Great! Now it's clear. Any conclusion from the whole story?

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Using Aworker, Mike receives additional income and gets a reputation of a reliable employee. Now, it is much easier for him to start working for another company. Mike has a good reputation as his results are confirmed by Aworker’s decentralized rating.

Author: a007mr
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Sounds very promising! Now I see how it works with employees.

Author: Marseiliais
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: At last I have a detailed explanation of how AWE tokens can be used with employees. Thank you!

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: You are welcome!

Author: BountifulMan
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: and where are the results of interviews?

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: What do you mean?

Author: BountifulMan
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: any pivots as a result of interviews?

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: All the pivots resulting from the interviews are mentioned in the latest version of our WP or will be mentioned in its next versions. With every new version of our WP we're literally pivoting towards a greater pain point.

Author: BountifulMan
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: What do you mean by "attitude to work"?

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: When people think of having a positive attitude, they probably think it’s little more than plastering a smile on their face and trying to think happy thoughts.  But it’s more than that.

Author: BountifulMan
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Oh, really?

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: "A job attitude is a set of evaluations of one's job that constitute one's feelings toward, beliefs about, and attachment to one's job." - Job Attitudes. Annual Review of Psychology. Vol. 63:341-367 Timothy A. Judge and John D. Kammeyer-Mueller (Volume publication date - January 2012)  Well, it's all about keeping a positive attitude at work.

Author: BountifulMan
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Do various values have the same weight in calculation of total coefficient?

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Various values will have DIFFERENT weight in calculation of the total coefficient that determines an employee's position in our rating.

Author: FidelioCplus
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: What are other values having weight in calculating total coefficient?

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: They are the following: your communication skills shown during the month; your attitude to work during the month; the support given by you to the colleagues during the month.

Author: FidelioCplus
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: To say the truth the issues we are raising here touch me personally literally every day when I am selecting candidates. To what point are their resumes authentic? How profound their skills and competencies are? How can I check that they really can do the things they are writing about? How can I trust the referencies given in a resume or in contacts?

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: How do you think, can Blockchain technology help with these problems?

Author: FidelioCplus
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: I wish this technology could help and solve these problems. First, the problem of data verification, of the data about skills, competencies, the previous experience. I wish the information about the candidates I review every day was inherently verified, trustworthy, and up-to-date. And that is why I have very high hopes for the new blockchain-based services.

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Do you know any blockchain startups that can provide such solutions?

Author: FidelioCplus
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: I  know a great number of blockchain startups specializing in data protection in the most diverse spheres… Finally…Fortunately, there is Aworker service in Russia that can help me solve my professional tasks, help job seekers elevate their professional reputation and become more reliable and desirable candidates this way, help my customers and market participants have the most reliable and relevant information.

Author: Marenat
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: What is your strategy for fraud prevention?

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Accumulating reviews about companies and workers will make it possible to examine fraud.

Author: Marenat
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Will you have any other ways to monitor for fraud besides collecting reviews?

Author: Marenat
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: And what's the next step?

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Then you give a link to some confirming document (some certificate or diploma) to be checked by other users.

Author: Marenat
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: And then?

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Then the users vote for or against your having the mentioned skill.

Author: cjohn8
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Are they supposed to vote for free?

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: The users are supposed to send AWE tokens to a Prize Fund to be authorized for voting and then the voters who win a majority are supposed to get their rewards from the Prize Fund.

Author: cjohn8
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: What can be verified?

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Skills. Work experience. Education.

Author: cjohn8
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: And what is evaluated?

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Accountability. Transparency. Self-improvement.

Author: cjohn8
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: What does transparency mean?

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: An employee who is willing to work under transparent condition signals that he/she has nothing to hide from the experts or the community. Even in the social networks

Author: cjohn8
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: By what things can the experts and the community members evaluate an employee?

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: By the information about their personal development in their social networks, for example. By the posts about the trainings and the professional events they attend.

Author: cjohn8
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: And what is the biggest reason people attend professional events?

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Networking!

Author: BountifulMan
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: and btw what kind of the research did you conduct ? like HR interviews or smth? why your WP doesnt provide any data on that?

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Our White paper is based on the analysis of the current situation at the sales sector of labour market. You can read through the solutions we provide for HR problems defined during the analysis and find out more about the role of Blockchain in our project.

Author: BountifulMan
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Have you got any market research results or referencies to them?

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: We have conducted a market research regarding the sales companies and the recruitment of personnel there. We have taken into consideration the reports from those companies. Also we have talked to more than 50 HR directors from such companies as Alpha Bank, Rive Gauche, X5 Retail Group, etc. Here are the references to ILO, IFC, etc from our WP:  http://www.ilo.org/wcmsp5/groups/public/---dgreports/---dcomm/---publ/documents/publication/wcms_443472.pdf http://www.ilo.org/wcmsp5/groups/public/---dgreports/---dcomm/---publ/documents/publication/wcms_443472.pdf http://www.ilo.org/global/research/global-reports/weso/2016/WCMS_443480/lang--en/index.htm http://www.ifc.org/wps/wcm/connect/Industry_EXT_Content/IFC_External_Corporate_Site/Industries/Financial+Markets/msme+finance/sme+banking/msme-countryindicators http://www.ifc.org/wps/wcm/connect/Industry_EXT_Content/IFC_External_Corporate_Site/Industries/Financial+Markets/msme+finance/sme+banking/msme-countryindicators https://medium.com/@wtfmitchel/linkedin-10-million-monthly-active-users-a482e2ecc086 https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/issues/20

Author: Marseiliais
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: For example, I am a job candidate who wants to have more detailed information about some company in particular. What can Aworker do for me?

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Aworker will give you an exact information about the feedback from various employees on that company and help you to make the right decision about it.

Author: Marseiliais
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: What happens when the data is sent to Blockchain?

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: The total coefficient is calculated and a worker's personal rating is determined by it.

Author: Marseiliais
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: What influences a position in your rating?

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: A worker’s position in the rating depends on the assessment results provided by a supervisor and a worker’s verified skills.

Author: Marseiliais
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: What is an employee to do to be listed in your rating?

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: An employee describes the skills he/she possesses. If people give a decentralized verification of these skills via smart contract in the blockchain, then this employee is rewarded for participation in our Rating.

Author: Marseiliais
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Are those people who participate in the skills verification also get rewarded?

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Yes, all the voters can get rewarded too.

Author: Sovper11
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: What do you mean by "all the voters"?

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Yes, I should specify this here   All the voters from the majority of upvoters or downvoters.

Author: Sovper11
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: You mean the majority that is for or against confirmation of some skill?

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Exactly.

Author: Sovper11
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: So how can I understand that my skill is confirmed?

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: An employee’s skill is deemed confirmed only after the minimum number of votes is collected.

Author: Sovper11
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Is the skills verification guaranteed by smart contract?

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: A special smart contract provides a transparent procedure of personal skills verification for every participant.

Author: Marenat
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: If I'm an employee what does the whole algorithm look like for me?

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Well, you log in Aworker and denote the skill you've got.

Author: Marenat
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: And from the very beginning, you assume that a direct supervisor/employee will have enough expertise to evaluate an employee?

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: In sales yes.

Author: Marenat
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Can it be possible that some employers will sell their friends for their previous employees and give their friends the best grades to help their career?

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: We will keep working on this issue to make sure that the employers don't cheat.

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: First of all, our ratings are to be updated every next month.

Author: Marenat
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: How will you prevent cheating by the employers, first of all?

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Now I can say that the personality of a manager who is authorized to confirm the data will be carefully checked. This person must have 3 verifications from employees of the company. The employees will also be authorized to give grades to a manager/company remaining anonymous. Any hidden conflict of interest between them and their direct employer/supervisor will immediately become transparent to the user. In this way our project brings a lot of potential problems to cheaters.

Author: Marenat
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Will you get closer to the real life, please?

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: We will keep working on this issue to make sure that the employers don't cheat.

Author: FidelioCplus
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: So what exactly are you talking about when you mention those "competencies"?

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: About providing a suite of competencies for evaluation work. The competencies are to be specified by a certain employee at his/her will.

Author: FidelioCplus
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Which companies will be granted access to your Rating?

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Any legit company that is registered can have access to our Rating.

Author: FidelioCplus
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Do you believe that any job candidate can choose the right competencies for his/her profile description?

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: We strongly believe that any professional worker can do that task.

Author: FidelioCplus
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Do you believe that any employer can objectively assess employee skills and competencies?

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: We strongly believe that a competent employer can do that task.

Author: wya12345
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Interesting concept. Can't say how practical this can be at the moment. Even similar jobs/positions in different companies may end up in various workloads. How do you evaluate/compare employees based on different standards? How does 1 candidate stand out if most people in the same category have similar skills and monthly work completion rates?

Author: Sovper11
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Interesting concept of Blockchain utilization, but what will be at the end of implementation is even more interesting.

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Now we are speaking strictly about giving grades for the competencies described by workers in their own profiles on our platform. And those workers are sales employees strictly speaking. And our platform will help them build their reputation from scratch by regulating the evaluations exchanged in a team.

Author: BountifulMan
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: What does the process of hiring look like?

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: While hiring workers a company selects those who match the job and who have key professional competencies to do it well. With the help of the information from our platform an HR manager will understand whether a job candidate is good for the company in question or he/she is good for some other company.

Author: BountifulMan
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: What if I am a cool sales manager but I can't supply evidence of my qualifications and results by any official documents?

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: In this case you will have to go through our specialized testing with a time limit. This procedure can include testing your English level, your computer skills and your sales skills as well.

Author: lelahkenabanned
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: hey dev any bounty campaign or airdrop ?

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: You can join our Bounty here

Author: BountifulMan
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: I'm interested how the presence of the certificate, for example, English language certificate, will help to show that a job candidate really has a good command of English?

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: With your certificate or diploma you can demonstrate that your English level meets certain quality requirements, that your English language competency is certified.

Author: BountifulMan
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Sometimes you can possess this competency without having any certificate...

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Still any potential employer needs to understand what competencies of candidate he/she can rely on in the real work situations. He/she wants to see some real marks of quality before trusting an employee.

Author: cjohn8
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: What if I haven't got any certificate of that kind?

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: If an employee doesn't have any certificate we will have an accurate assessment of his/her English level.

Author: cjohn8
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Will your testing be with or without a time limit?

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Of course, our assessment will have some form of a time limit.

Author: cjohn8
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: And what if I've got certified already?

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: If an employee has got a certificate he/she will be given grades every month by his/her direct supervisor/employee for any certified competency. The grades will be saved in the blockchain and updated every month. You should never stop improving.

Author: cjohn8
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: As I see knowledge of English level is just taken as an example of any competency needed for employment?

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Sure. Testing your English level, your computer skills and your sales skills means testing only a minimum set of your competencies.

Author: cjohn8
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Do you mean survival-level competencies in sales?

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Exactly.

Author: rendravolt
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: It looks good, interesting, cool, I will continue to follow because it's one of the best end-of-year project endings.

Author: mt55
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Doesn't your project bring about a lot of potential problems for workers? What if a manager doesn't like you for personal reasons? Could he/she give you a negative rating which is then forever stored in the blockchain with no possibility to remove "false" info?

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Thank you. Please, join our official group on Telegram https://t.me/aworkerio to get the latest news.

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: In order to be listed in Aworker independent rating an employee’s key competencies are to be assessed by his/her direct supervisor/employer.

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: AWE token is a token for professionals. The stronger a worker’s reputation is the more beneficial terms are offered to a worker by our partners.

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: The personality of a manager who is authorized to confirm the data will be carefully checked. This person must have 3 verifications from employees of the company. The employees will also be authorized to give grades to a manager/company remaining anonymous. Any hidden conflict of interest between them and their direct employer/supervisor will immediately become transparent to the user. In this way our project brings a lot of potential problems for cheaters.

Author: BountifulMan
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: What kind of system do you want to create?

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: We want to create an honest and reliable evaluation system so that every employee in small, medium and large businesses could take advantage of our international decentralized system and would have good opportunities to develop their career and improve their life.

Author: Marenat
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: In what way will a company and an employee be able to evaluate each other?

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: An employee and a company (being represented by a manager or an HR manager) will be authorized to write reviews about each other at any time if they wish. These reviews will be available in the profiles of both an employee and a company. It will be an auxiliary tool for getting or giving recommendations also.

Author: Marenat
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: What exactly are you going to evaluate about sales employees?

Author: cjohn8
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: How can a worker and a company make a decision about cooperation with the help of your platform?

Author: a007mr
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: What questions would you ask a sales employee to prove his/her competency?

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Each month a worker will be receiving evaluations of his/her work. A supervisor will be evaluating his/her key competencies.

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: An employee will be able to see the overall rating, the data and reviews regarding the companies.  A company will be able to see the overall rating, the data, professional skills and feedback regarding the employees in their profiles.  On the basis of the whole information both parties will be able to make decisions regarding mutually beneficial cooperation.

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: For example, if there is a sales consultant we're going to question his/her key competency just the following way. Has an employee shown excellent communicative skills and an ability for cooperation with colleagues this month? What was his/her attitude to work? What were his/her relationships within the team like?

Author: a007mr
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Are there any solid reasons for staff members to participate in your rating?

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: There are some. Just look, our Rating enables them to:  Demonstrate competencies and create the reputation of a reliable employee. Earn additional income. Become the best specialist in their professional field in their city or in the whole world (enhancing their Personal Expertise).

Author: a007mr
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Are you going to evaluate plan fulfillment?

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: In the future we will develop a special algorithm for evaluation of such professional qualities of a worker as effectiveness and plan fulfillment. In this case data will vary for every specialization according to the characteristics of the appointment taken up by an employee.

Author: Marseiliais
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: A former employer does not provide any relevant information about a specialist...

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: We want to create a reliable system showing specialist’s performance and providing assessment throughout his/her whole career. Of course, people quit their job for many reasons... However, we believe that in most cases it's the company’s fault and that any employer can prevent employee turnover with our help.

Author: Marseiliais
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: I think an important question is how the team is going to tackle issues in the real world.

Author: JonathanHiggins
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: That's the only way Aworker is going to be successful.

Author: Sovper11
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: You once told that you wanted to use KPIs as evaluation criteria for workers. Do you believe it's realistic?

Author: Marseiliais
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: And you've somewhere mentioned performance score as the way to evaluate an employee's performance...

Author: JonathanHiggins
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Last week in your official Telegram group you said that there will be a new version of your White Paper this week.

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Yes, the new version of our White Paper is to be released this week. We will do our best to keep our promise.

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Now we are placing emphasis on competency-based grading system instead of performance check. Please, feel free to ask more questions and we will clarify what we mean by that.

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: KPIs will be included in our long-term development plan. By now we have come up with a more realistic strategy for grading employees.

Author: JonathanHiggins
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: On what evaluation criteria are you going to base your Rating now?

Author: Marseiliais
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: What a worker's position in your Rating will depend on?

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Our Rating will be based on a worker's communication skills shown during the month; attitude to work during the month; support given to his/her colleagues during the month.

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: A worker's position in our Rating will depend on the grades given by his/her direct supervisor/employer and his/her verified skills.

Author: Marseiliais
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: How often an employee's work will be evaluated during a year?

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: An employee will be given grades for his/her work activity every month.

Author: qtasiarz
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: if you need Polsih translation let me know

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: If you mean translating our ANN thread into Polish with its further moderation, please, join our Bounty https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2321373.new#new

Author: Sovper11
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: What is your token needed for? Why tokenize reputation building?

Author: BountifulMan
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: What is needed to be listed in your rating?

Author: FidelioCplus
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: I would resign from my current job only if my ethics or morals were challenged.

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: What could make you stay?

Author: Sovper11
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: I would do just about any job as long as the pay is right. Everyone has their number. But now I've got a better job than I had before.

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: What could have made you stay at your previous job if there had been any chance to do that?

Author: Sovper11
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: For me, my old job would've had to raise my pay by literally four times for me to consider staying. Of course, they wouldn't actually ever do that.

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Low wages year after year?

Author: Sovper11
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: They can really ruin your self-esteem. Slowly but surely.

Author: Marenat
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: I quit my job of 10 years a few days ago. Too much drama. Just walked out in the middle of the shift, muttering “I quit” to the boss as I walked by. Living off of savings for a while and catching up on some personal hobbies. Highly recommended.

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Great experience! Have you built a strong reputation to have a better job?

Author: Marenat
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Yeah, sure! And I have found a better job (better pay, better hours, better benefits). Now there is a far better opportunity to use/improve my skills and abilities. Though I left the previous job on bad terms. My former employer refused to give any reference.

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Marenat, how do you find your performance in a new team now?

Author: Marenat
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Just great! I am getting lots of moral support from my new team now.

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Practice proves that an employee can perform quite well in a new team even without very flattering recommendations.

Author: Marenat
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: My new team is motivating me even more than money. Though a high salary is part of job satisfaction, too.

Author: a007mr
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: It’s natural that people quit their job, but there're hard feelings between a worker and his/her former boss very often.

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: It shouldn't be this way though. Knowing what you’re worth is essential for a person’s self-perception and by showing skills and abilities to the world it becomes much easier for people to find the job with a higher salary and a better boss.

Author: a007mr
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: And what is the role of your platform in the situations like that?

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: It's all about having self-respect and dignity! Aworker is the decentralized professional platform that can deal with your career problems by providing independent rating services. Due to that many employees can prove their professionalism on a global scale. Our rating system will push people harder to study better and to become much more proficient in a particular field.

Author: Marseiliais
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: As far as I see today's recruitment market lacks a reliable system showing specialist’s performance and assessment throughout the whole career rather than when he/she quits a job.

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: It's really so, because all the positive referencies are given when a candidate is leaving a company.

Author: masterpi33
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: After reviewing your site, I did not find the information when ICO starts. As I understood in December, what is the exact date?

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: If we create our own ecosystem we will create special offers on the products from our partners for our customers.

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Please, read through our Bounty program here https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2321373.new#new

Author: patriziobtc
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: The project is interesting but how is it ensured that the rating is really independent and not influenced by the employee?

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: The ICO starts after the 10th of December, 2017, and ends in March, 2018. You can subscribe to the newsletter on our website https://aworker.io in order to know the exact dates as soon as they are finally set.

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: This is what we need Blockchain technology for: to limit employers and employees' subjectivity but not to completely get rid of it. We treasure subjective experience of real professionals who can share it with us in the form of their values and evaluation.

Author: BountifulMan
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: What is your reputation building platform needed for?

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: If you want to leave your current job having a good reputation is important.

Author: BountifulMan
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: My reputation is the most valuable thing I possess when I am looking for a new job.

Author: tutorninja
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: way better than limkedin!!!! How can I participate?

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Thank you! Just join our Telegram chat https://t.me/aworkerio/ and subscribe to our newsletter on our website https://aworker.io

Author: a007mr
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: People who have good jobs are searching for better ones.

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Having joined our project they will be able to build a strong reputation of reliable employees with a few mouse clicks. Please, read the informative article by our CEO about the most common reasons peple quit their jobs.

Author: a007mr
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: It's always interesting what are the reasons to quit the job you love...

Author: JonathanHiggins
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: just because you love the work you’re doing doesn’t always mean that the environment is healthy for you

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: People can quit their job for many reasons.

Author: JonathanHiggins
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: I left my previous job only for one reason. The reason was simple. I worked in retail, we were extremely shorthanded and the boss started taking 3-4 hour lunch breaks and showing up an hour or two late(often intoxicated or made no effort whatsoever to sleep for his shift). The rest of the employees were adopting his attitude towards work and taking extended breaks and an overall poor work ethic. Upper management refused to fire him, and they would never fire me because I was shouldering all of the work. So, either I had to bear the workload of 2-3 people, all while getting no recognition for it whatsoever, or walk out.

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Thank you for sharing your experience.

Author: cjohn8
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: I would quit the job I love only because of bad management.

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: According to the study from Harvard Business Review, there are three steady reasons why people leave a current job: Relationship with the boss; Steady wage for years; Unchallenging tasks.

Author: Marseiliais
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: What happens next?

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Then our rating gets updated every month after your supervisor verifies it. And you're rewarded according to your skills and accomplishments.

Author: cjohn8
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: What's the use of your rating?

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Out independent and decentralized rating shows the effectiveness of employees and helps them build a solid professional reputation. Every sales employee can become the best in their city or country.

Author: cjohn8
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Does it give any ideas for measuring employee effectiveness?

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Yes, it does, especially if a certain employee adequatly specifies skills he/she possesses and helps us to gather more true information this way.

Author: FidelioCplus
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: How can I get a reward if I specify my skills this way?

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: You get rewarded as soon as people give decentralized verification of your skills via blockchain smart contract.

Author: FidelioCplus
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: What is the source of employee reward?

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: This is a good question to ask. Aworker shares with you the advertising budget of companies interested in your skills.

Author: FidelioCplus
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: What percentage of advertising budget will be reserved for rewarding employees?

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: 50% of our advertising budget will be distributed among the skilled workers whose skills are demanded by potential employers.

Author: FidelioCplus
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: What kind of workers will you be interested in?

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: We will be interested in sales employees with actual skills.

Author: FidelioCplus
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: What if I invite a friend of mine?

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: In this case you can be rewarded for your connections. If your friend really is a good match for the job, of course.

Author: BountifulMan
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Under what conditions exactly?

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: A company will pay you a reward if your friend joins this company (his/her qualifications matching to the job there).

Author: BountifulMan
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: What will be the benefits of your ecosystem?

Author: GreenRivers
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Finally a legitimate looking project on this site... It gets so annoying looking through all the scams. Any bounties?

Author: a007mr
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Which currency will you be accepting?

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: We will be accepting ETH, for sure.

Author: Sovper11
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: will your project be open source?

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Our project will be based on open-source information. We want as much transparency as possible in order to show that our people are trustable.

Author: Sovper11
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: How much money do you plan to raise? What is your hard cap?

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: We are going to reduce our hard cap as we calculated it in the summer when the exchange rate equaled 200. Now we want to reduce the amount of ETH in order not to take extra money from investors. Next week there will be a new version of our White Paper. So, please, follow the news.

Author: Sovper11
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: i'm looking forward to your news

Author: JonathanHiggins
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: How will Aworker help sales employees? Will it make their life easier?

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: With Aworker the employees will be able to get rewards for their good performance, professional achievements and communicative skills.

Author: JonathanHiggins
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: What instruments will be used to provide your independent ratings?

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: We will provide our independent ratings for professionals with the help of AWE tokens and the Ethereum blockchain

Author: JonathanHiggins
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Why is trust in candidates such a big problem?

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: In real life their competencies can be proved only by the recommendations from their former employers or direct supervisors. And such a reference doesn't give true information very often.

Author: Marseiliais
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Finally, what do you use blockchain for?

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Blockchain technology is needed to secure all the processes taking place at our decentralized professional platform.

Author: Marseiliais
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: And what are those processes?

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Having accomplishments in career. Showing professional experience. Getting rewards.

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Our project is designed to make it possible for every person involved in it to build a strong reputation of a reliable worker who can be trusted to do the job as promised.

Author: Marseiliais
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: How to join Aworker ratings?

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: To participate in Aworker independent rating you should enter the data about plan fulfillment in the previous month.

Author: Sofar
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Nice project!!! Gonna have a look when the ICO start !!!

Author: cjohn8
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: The assessment by the employer will lead to subjectivity since the factor of personal attitude will influence the evaluation.

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: This is what we need Blockchain technology for. For finding trustable companies and trustworthy candidates.

Author: cjohn8
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: There is still the malignant human factor. Subjectivity remains there.

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: A subjective evaluation in a good way, of course, is part of our concept. Other conditions being equal, nobody can evaluate an employee’s soft skills better than his/her own employer. Any customer’s evaluation turns out to be subjective too.

Author: cjohn8
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: I agree with you up to a point, but in blockchain we decentralize information to achieve objectivity.

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: We will add objectivity to our Ratings by measuring KPIs.

Author: cjohn8
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Ok sounds good.

Author: Marseiliais
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Does your CTO have any blockchain experience?

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Let me check and get back to you.

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: You can subscribe to the newsletter on our website https://aworker.io and follow the news

Author: Marseiliais
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Does your CTO have any experience of work with blockchain or solidity?

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: He has strong Kaspersky development experience, but he has never worked with solidity or blockchain before.

Author: Sovper11
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Does Aworker have a github that is open for viewing?

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Not yet. We will have it in the nearest future. Just follow the news.

Author: Sovper11
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Can you specify when is the ico supposed to start and end?

Author: Marenat
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: There is info missing from the white paper regarding the token sale. Like which currencies are you accepting, how much of your token i can get with 1 eth. etc

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: The ICO starts after the 10th of December, 2017, and ends in March, 2018.

Author: JonathanHiggins
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: That’s okay. Looking forward to more exact dates.

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: You can subscribe to the newsletter on our website https://aworker.io

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: You can just click “Recommend a Friend” button.

Author: FidelioCplus
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Where and how do I keep my tokens?

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: You can keep AWE tokens in any wallet that supports ERC20 tokens. For example, in the MyEtherWallet.

Author: FidelioCplus
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Is there a lock-up period for the team and reserved fund tokens?

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Yes, the lock-up period is 12 months.

Author: BountifulMan
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Are there any special bonuses?

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Questions about bonuses are reviewed on the individual basis by our Core team. Please, send us an email to hello@aworker.io

Author: FidelioCplus
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Is there a minimum amount of AWE tokens I can buy?

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: The minimum purchase of AWE tokens equals 0,1 ETH.

Author: BountifulMan
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Hi dev team! Will you, please, tell us, how will you evaluate the competencies of employees?

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Hello! We are working on this now.

Author: BountifulMan
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: The matter is that companies are trusted only by certified assessors, and the assessment methodology is rather complicated.

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: What do you mean?

Author: BountifulMan
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: It is impossible to accurately determine the level of development of a particular competency without conducting a special procedure of assessment.

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: We are planning to provide independent ratings verified by employers.

Author: BountifulMan
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: And by whom will be those employers verified?

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: The status of the employer is to be confirmed by at least 3 real employees from the employer’s company. The employers found cheating will be blocked or their rating will be downgraded.

Author: BountifulMan
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: The verification procedure is a rather complicated question. If you can solve it, you will succeed! I have been studying evaluation, training and personnel development for a long time, and I understand that such a system is simply necessary. But it will be in demand only if the assessment is accurate and operative.

Author: FidelioCplus
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Some tricky issues, huh, devs?

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Speaking of hard skills, we will evaluate the competencies of employees on the basis of specialized testing. As for the soft skills, the competencies will be evaluated by an employer.

Author: Marseiliais
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Which exactly?

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: KPIs will depend on eacn individual country's peculiarities, but in general their achievement will be conditioned by a worker's competencies, functional skills and performance management.

Author: Marseiliais
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Something else?

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Aworker includes performance management, competencies based score check and various professional instruments to help employees feel more confident and - it is a key point - to earn benefits with us as well. Finally, with Aworker you will be able to build yourself a valid reputation on the basis of a true story about your career.

Author: cjohn8
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Are you going to introduce a trust score for employees?

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Yes, sure.

Author: cjohn8
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: I found that your project looks similar to Latium. What is the difference/benefits of your project then?

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Latium is developing an automated rating system for marketing events and is aimed at fulfilling the tasks with multiple contracts. We are developing an absolutely different project with a specialized rating system for sales employees. Our ratings will be provided by sales employers for their employees.

Author: cjohn8
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: On the basis of what?

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: On the basis of the skills sales employers are looking for. This is our niche.

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Don’t hesitate to ask for specification!

Author: BountifulMan
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: The idea of a globalized trust score is very tricky with Latium. Things will work out only if it's universally accepted, which is doubtful.

Author: Marseiliais
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Trust in candidates must be supported somehow by some community of people.

Author: a007mr
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: What is your way to make your ecosystem work?

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Our algorithm for success is the following. The employee fills in the information which is automatically inserted into our ratings after being verified by the employer. The status of the employer is to be confirmed by at least 3 real employees from the employer’s company. The employers found cheating will be blocked or their rating will be downgraded.

Author: JonathanHiggins
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: I see you are looking for trustable companies and trustworthy employees.

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Yeah, exactly!

Author: Marseiliais
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Have you got a trustworthy team?

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Our Russian Core Team comprises strong HR professionals and talented specialists in advertising, marketing and public relations. You can be confident we are ready to help optimise your potential and profitability.

Author: FidelioCplus
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: How can I earn with my contacts?

Author: Marseiliais
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: What about KYC/KYB? It’s difficult to enter any exchange without going through these procedures beforehand.

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Good question. We’re working on this now in order to meet the existing requirements.

Author: FidelioCplus
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Waiting for more details about distribution.

Author: BountifulMan
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: I will wait for more information about distribution too. How big is the percentage of the coin being pre-mined?

Author: JonathanHiggins
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: How can I monetize my skills with your project?

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: You describe your skills. People confirm your skills on the basis of decentralization. If they do so, we give businesses the opportunity to show you the ads that are correctly targeted to the skills you described. You view the correctly targeted ads. You can get your share of the advertising budget 50% of which will be distributed among the viewers of the targeted ads.

Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Have you got a whitelist?

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: We haven't got any.

Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: We need Blockchain technology to create a simple, credible, independent and objective ratings system.

Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment

Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment

Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Thank you!

Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment

Author: a007mr
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Does it look better?

Author: cjohn8
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Poloniex looks better as well but I can't say that it matters too much to actual trading.  It's just quite pleasant.

Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Who thinks here that Poloniex is more reliable?

Author: cjohn8
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: To me, it seems more reliable. It also has a much larger trading volume which is better, and I rely on Bittrex a lot less (especially since they're not allowing fiat withdrawals for their Bitcoin/fiat exchange, which makes me think they're having serious trouble and something might go wrong).

Author: Marenat
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Poloniex has become very selective on listing new altcoins recently. If I remember correctly, for all new ethereum based tokens I need to go for either bittrex or liqui exchange. There were times poloniex offered free coins. Recently I have noticed their withdrawal takes little bit delay compared to earlier days (probably high volume of withdrawal requests is a reason).

Author: Marseiliais
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: How many exchanges are you using now?

Author: Marenat
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: I am using more than 5 exchanges, just based on availability of one particular altcoin I will be using an exchange. Also, I have a habit of choosing exchange for getting better prices when the same coin trades in a gap.

Author: BountifulMan
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: To be very honest, don't trust any of the exchanges with the amount you can't afford to lose. Regardless of the exchanges, you shouldn't be storing coins in your wallets online. In terms of service discussion, I'd choose Bittrex any day.

Author: cjohn8
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: On what will your coin be built? On the waves or the etherium?

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment

Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment

Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment

Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment

Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: In order to enter and succeed in a global B2B market we should create our own ecosystem by connecting our partners to the platform. For this purpose we need to open head offices in the key large cities of the world.

Author: JonathanHiggins
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Cities are the key to tomorrow’s economies.

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: This why our target is that big. Our target is explained by our business model.

Author: Marenat
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Have you got an overall Road Map? What are your milestones?

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: With 20 mln we may have full-scale project launch in Europe. If we raise 25 mln we will be able to successfully enter and grow in the Asian market. 34 mln will enable us to launch our application all over the world.  For more detailed information about our product, you can read through our White Paper.

Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: So what is your niche?

Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment

Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment

Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment

Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment

Author: Xandan
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: I didn't go through all the information deeply so can't say anything as final words or opinion at this moment. I see this project interesting that's why would like to ask for my satisfaction what is the difference between aworker and indorse project. I usually don't quote other projects but sometimes it is inevitable to mention their names.

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: We will accept ETH for sure. As for the other cryptos it all depends.

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Indorse allows the users to profit from sharing their skills and activities on the platform by giving back the ownership of the data to them. As for Aworker, we go further than our competitors by connecting employers and potential employees on the basis of decentralized reputation building. Indorse facilitates decentralized confirmation of skills too. As for our key advantage it is our ability to provide independent ratings services. Indorse lacks this ability.

Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment

Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: The part about trust in candidates is kinda tricky. It'll only work out if the majority of people use it, or if it's universally accepted, which are sort of related. I guess we can all agree that's a bit too big to claim for the ICO.

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: We believe in crowd wisdom too. It's up to the majority of people to decide whether our solution is the best or not. We have found our niche in meeting the needs of professionals, businesses and internet advertising at our Reputation Building Platform on the Ethereum blockchain. Our ultimate goal is building a unique Artificial Intelligence Personal Assistant for the purpose of international HR management. So we believe it's enough to claim for the ICO as soon as there is a very high market demand for our product now.

Author: Marenat
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: What is your token needed for? How will it work?

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: We strongly believe that our token is necessary for the following things. First, our token is an instrument of Reputation building. Second, our token is the means of payment for advertising. Third, our token is an instrument for promotion of employee profiles.

Author: Sovper11
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: nice project with good idea

Author: BountifulMan
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: By the way, I found, that your project looks similar to Indorse. What is the difference/benefits of your project then?

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Indorse allows the users to profit from sharing their skills and activities on the platform by giving back the ownership of the data to them. As for Aworker, we go further than our competitors by connecting employers and potential employees on the basis of decentralized reputation building. Indorse facilitates decentralized confirmation of skills too. As for our key advantage it is our ability to provide independent ratings services. Indorse lacks this ability.

Author: gadgetino
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: i think this is an unrealistic target to reach. you guys come in late..this type of service already exists..e-lance and freelancer and also latium if you consider cryptoworld.

Author: gadgetino
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: i do not want to be a downer. i like this kind of decentralized project orientated type of jobs, but the target you set i thik is just too big.

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Aworker is an autonomous eco-platform  The challenge is to gather employers and job seekers within this platform. We are not a copy of e-lance, freelancer or latium. We are making a product that will make it possible for every professional to prove their skills on a global scale. Our product is an independent rating of such linear staff jobs as sales consultant, sales managers, business executives, etc. That’s why we have a better solution than  e-lance, freelancer or latium can have.

Author: BountifulMan
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Who is going to get the rewards after being included into your Rating?

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: We will regularly make the Top 20 List ranking of the top 20 workers for each individual country. Highly qualified persons can get their rewards according to the rank they have achieved.

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: There will be two Tokens Sales during the ICO: Token Sale#1 (December, 2017) and Token Sale#2 (March, 2018). For more information about the exact dates, please, subscribe to our newsletter on our website https://aworker.io As for achievements, they are really important for reputation building and skills assessment. Picking the perfect candidate involves all the criteria you've mentioned. Aworker project is designed to give better knowledge of your professional future, of your future employer or your future employee, and better understanding of your own abilities. Thank you for your interest to Aworker project.

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: We are not an advanced prototype of Linkedin or Freelance. For example, LinkedIn basically gives you a very limited functionality on your network, it doesn’t work for many other different things, which are important when making career. Aworker includes performance management, competencies based score check and many different stuff to help out employees feel more confident and, it is a key point, to earn benefits with us as well. Finally, with Aworker you are able to build yourself a valid reputation of a professional, with a true story of your career.

Author: FidelioCplus
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: How much will it cost to access the Rating module if I am a worker?

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: There will be free access for workers. Only gas will be paid for entering data into the Rating list.

Author: FidelioCplus
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: And how will you monetize your ecosystem for businesses?

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: There will be only paid services for businesses. The cost of our services for companies will reach up $40/mo. Our average bill for corporate customers will be up to $200/mo. In general we have four types of monetization: - paid accounts for companies; - premium accounts for workers; - advertising (of companies and employee profiles); - escrow (it guarantees performance of contracts and constitutes 1%).

Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: So its basically a decentralised job portal site. You have mentioned in the ann thread that you will classify all job seekers into different category like A list which is for best workers like that. But how you are going to do that . Or you do that by evaluvating ones experience certificate?

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Our Bug Bounty will start later as soon as smart contract is created and smart contract output appears.

Author: daapps
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: How much different would be token prices for #1 and #2 sales?

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Look here - it's just simple! Aworker is a decentralized system of reputation building. Reputation is built with the help of our ratings. The employee fills in the information which is automatically inserted into our ratings after being verified by the employer. The status of the employer is to be confirmed by at least 3 real employees from the employer’s company. The employers found cheating will be blocked or their rating will be downgraded. The whole idea of A List is about choosing the right job candidates for the right jobs and vice versa.

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Token Sale #1: 2014AWE for 1ETH (December, 2017)  Token Sale #2: 1410AWE for 1ETH (March, 2018)

Author: zuzuca
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: why is this divided in 2 stages? what do you bring extra from latium that promotes almost the same ideeas?

Author: xenium
Title: 🌟🚀Aworker - Blockchain Platform for Recruitment
Body: Instead of having a pre-ICO we decided to have two Token Sales. First, we want to ensure our investors that no more tokens will be issued than they initially assume. Second, we want to avoid creating any uncertainty about how much money has been raised in total. Third, we have prepared a beneficial program for early investors during Token Sale#1.  We bring extra the whole concept of Reputation building, monetization and customer relationship. Aworker is an absolutely unique project that provides independent Ratings for employees on the basis of decentralization. And there will be free access for employees. Only gas will be paid for entering data into the Rating list by them.
